UIScripts.lowerHigher_definition: Shows whether the value of the site area is higher/lower than that of the comparison geography.
UIScripts.comparisonValue_definition: Shows value for a comparison geography.

ExportDialog.title: Title:

ExportDialog.enableDataDrillingTooltip: Interactive experience allows you to explore variables in infographic panels to get more demographic information.
ExportDialog.exportMapsAsImagesTooltip:
A static map image will be exported instead of the dynamic map. This option can be used to export secured or private maps.

Enabling this option will significantly increase the export time.

ExportDialog.exportExcelMaps: Include map image in the Excel file
